name: Join & Strike: Stick Fight
description:
Gather, shoot and try to survive in a most dynamic shooter you only can imagine!
Start your adventure in a different locations defeating the enemy troops, clash with them! Try to make it without any loss. Capture all enemy bases with your squad and finally, defeat all BOSSes to become a greatest crowd!

Try to beat all enemies in a heroic survival locations. Dodge, gather and shoot with your gang versus a massive waves of enemies. Update your game strategy each time you join the battlefield! This challenges will reward you full. Unlock all locations, perks and merge your squad!

Face your enemies and grow your mighty army to become the greatest of them all!
